tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "A07DE43143E01CA9922EC2A3710F1C23", "Mayors can adjust Node tax rates which impact how much citizens and visitors will pay when doing business in the node.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "E057751B446D7DA0F6F555A6981AB0E3", "Global tax rates are a set % for all services. Higher level nodes allow for Mayors to set taxes based on types of services and even specific buildings.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "442AAAD64039CCC68F8744B9089594FB", "Taxes are a great way to increase funds for your node, but high taxes can stifle commerce. Make sure your tax rate is one your citizens can afford.")
